thread.title: ESPN to Lay Off About 300 Employees
thread.title_full: ESPN to Lay Off About 300 Employees - WSJ

author: Shalini Ramachandran
title: ESPN to Lay Off About 300 Employees
text:
ESPN said it would lay off nearly 300 employees at the company, or nearly 4% of its workforce, as the sports-media company looks to control costs in a challenging pay-TV landscape and reorganize for digital growth.
In a memo to employees, ESPN President John Skipper said the company plans to be “as supportive as we can during this transition” to the employees affected. ESPN has about 8,000 employees and is majority owned by Walt... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
